info.name: MyFigureCollection Ebony
info.description:
Preview of a dark theme for MFC 4.0
MFC Frontpage with Ebony
Picture Link

~ Additional options are being added as we wait for 4.0 ~
Verified Partner Mark (Test)

Currently only pages that 4.0 is present on.
Full implementation as MFC rolls 4.0 out everywhere.

Here is my MFC Profile for contact purposes.
Enjoy :)
info.additionalInfo: Latest General update to everything that was changed this week.

  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/Reltair"],

  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/ixu_komeiji"],
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/Yorokonde"],
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/Otaku-Planete"],
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/Kashima-Anime"],
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/whiterabbit"],
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/Play-Asia"],
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/nipponstation"],
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/PLAMOYA"],
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/AllblueWorld"],
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/Ninoma"],
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/RyanHlj"],
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/Nin-Nin-Game"],
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/kirinhobby"],
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/AkibaSoul_Martin"],
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/amiami_com"],
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/otakumode"],
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/animeblvd"],
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/evilcat005"],
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/PlazaJapan"],
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/otakurepublic"] {
    text-decoration: initial!important;
    color: rgb(255, 128, 0)!important;
  }
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/Kotobukiya"] .username::after,
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/anime-figuren-de"] .username::after,
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/SolarisJapan"] .username::after,
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/Reltair"] .username::after,
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/Figuya"] .username::after,
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/RightStufAnime"] .username::after,
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/Anime-Island"] .username::after,
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/Mitsurin"] .username::after,
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/BBTSNick"] .username::after,
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/ixu_komeiji"] .username::after,
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/Yorokonde"] .username::after,
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/Otaku-Planete"] .username::after,
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/Kashima-Anime"] .username::after,
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/whiterabbit"] .username::after,
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/Play-Asia"] .username::after,
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/nipponstation"] .username::after,
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/PLAMOYA"] .username::after,
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/AllblueWorld"] .username::after,
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/Ninoma"] .username::after,
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/RyanHlj"] .username::after,
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/Nin-Nin-Game"] .username::after,
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/kirinhobby"] .username::after,
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/AkibaSoul_Martin"] .username::after,
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/amiami_com"] .username::after,
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/otakumode"] .username::after,
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/animeblvd"] .username::after,
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/evilcat005"] .username::after,
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/PlazaJapan"] .username::after,
  a[href="https://myfigurecollection.net/profile/otakurepublic"] .username::after {
    content: '✔';
    display: inline-block;
    position: initial;
    font-size: 13px;
    color: #a290d1;
    background-color: white;
    border-radius: 100%;
    width: 13px;
    height: 13px;
    padding: 2px;
    margin-left: 3px;
  }
}
